description:
*0.1.1* Updated to enable touchpad full screen and navigation, *0.1.0* Initial version, This Trial version has a distance restriction and no saved preferences and data entry.

Do you ever travel further to a cheaper fuel station to fill up?

Is the trip worth while?

This app is for you, it will tell you if your trip is worth while and how much you could save.


Set the preferences to the options you require

Vehicle Fuel Economy Units:- mpg(UK), mpg(US) & L/100km

Fuel Purchase Units:- gal(UK), gal(US) & Litres

Distance Units:- Miles & km


Then fill in the 4 yellow boxes of:- Vehicle Economy, Local Fuel Price,
Distance to Other Fuel Source & Other Fuel Source Price

And the app will tell you:- Saving in your specified Fuel Units & 
Total Round Trip Cost

It will also tell you how much you need to spend and fill up with to make it worth while.
